pages.description: Page Object representing the Login page for ecommerce website.

actions.name: navigate_to_login_page
actions.description: Navigate to the login page using provided URL.

actions.name: enter_username
actions.description: Enter the username into the username field.

actions.name: enter_password
actions.description: Enter the password into the password field.

actions.name: verify_validation_error
actions.description: Verify that validation error is displayed.

actions.name: verify_account_lockout_notification
actions.description: Verify that account lockout notification is displayed.

actions.name: verify_user_on_login_page
actions.description: Verify that user remains on the login page.

actions.name: verify_email_notification_sent
actions.description: Verify that email notification is sent to user about account lockout.
